name: ONE MAN LAND
description:
WELCOME TO ONE MAN LAND.

After a terrible accident while going to the woods, you crash into a remote forest.
But your adventure doesn't stop there.

SURVIVE
You'll need to watch out for yourself. Take care of your health, hunger and energy.

EXPLORE
Bernath Forest is a beautiful place. Relaxing, filled with nature and wildlife, like rabbits, deers or wolves. Multiple places, some abandoned, you can visit to find a way out.

CRAFT ITEMS AND STORE THEM IN YOU INVENTORY
Rationalize what you carry around and use the materials you find around the map to craft new items.

GOOD LUCK.

Keep in mind this is a students' project done in 5 months and every single asset was made by us (sound was downloaded from freesound.org).

TEAM:

- Ícar Calvet Montoya

- Roger Gibert Rovira

- Oriol Viu Duran

ONLY PLAYABLE ON WINDOWS
